name: sequential
signature: <E, E2>(left: Cause<E>, right: Cause<E2>) => Cause<E | E2>
description:
Combines two `Cause`s sequentially.
*Details This function merges two errors that occurred in sequence, such as a main
error followed by a finalization error. It preserves both errors for complete
failure information.
documentation:
